wikipedia_page.main: John Brodie (born 5 January 1896) was a Scottish footballer who played for Celtic, Dumbarton, Ayr United and Chelsea.

response: John Brodie (born 1935) is an American NFL quarterback.
John Brodie may also refer to:
*John Brodie (footballer, died 1901), Scottish footballer (Burnley FC, Nottingham Forest)
*John Brodie (1905–1955), New Zealand writer who wrote as John Guthrie
